input_opts.//BgColorMinMax: defines background color (min-max range inclusive). color range is removed when >= 0

render_opts.//MarginBottom: defines logo margin to bottom border in px. position is clipped top picture border
render_opts.//MarginRight: defines logo margin to right border in px. position is clipped left picture border
render_opts.//Opacity: defines opacity level in range 0-100% (0: opaque - 100: transparent)
render_opts.//ScaledWidthHeight: defines logo scaling in px. Not implemented yet!
render_opts.//TopLeftXY: defines logo top left(x,y) position in px. position is clipped to max width and height (right and bottom picture border)
